summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ClipTag AI video processing SaaS. Backend APIs fully functional (21/21 tests passing). Frontend loads correctly with working authentication, navigation, and public pages. Main issue: protected routes (clips page) redirect to homepage due to authentication persistence issues.

resolved_issues.issue: Previous test failures resolved by fixing endpoint URLs and form data handling
resolved_issues.impact: All backend functionality now working correctly

critical_bugs.issue: Users cannot access /clips page - redirects to homepage even after successful login/registration

integration_issues.issue: JWT tokens not persisting properly in browser, causing protected route redirects

passed_tests: All 21 backend API endpoints working correctly
Homepage loads with correct hero section and FAQ about video uploads
FAQ page loads with comprehensive video upload questions
Pricing page shows correct $7.99 and $24.99 plans
Video upload related FAQ questions present and functional
All AI generation endpoints (story, voiceover, transcription, ranking, split-screen)
Proper error handling for unauthorized access

success_percentage.frontend: 70% (public pages working, authentication flow works but protected routes fail)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix authentication persistence issue preventing access to protected routes (/clips, /dashboard, /library). Users can register/login successfully but cannot access the main Generate Clips functionality. This blocks the core video processing feature testing.
